channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed’s Bostic expects no rate cuts in 2026 due to worries GOP tax bill might fuel inflation
item.description: Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic said he thought the economy was no longer in danger of a sharp rise in the unemployment rate that might spur a re...

item.title: Here’s how to hold crypto in your 401(k) right now, without waiting for your employer to come around
item.description: Crypto is headed to inclusion in retirement plans — if it can get past company plan sponsors.

item.title: Pfizer’s stock drops after drug giant lowers its revenue forecast
item.description: The pharmaceutical company updated its sales guidance for 2025, saying it now expects $62 billion in revenue for the year.

item.title: Gen Z would rather cut Social Security benefits for current retirees than pay higher taxes to save the program
item.description: There’s a stark generational divide in how to solve the Social Security crisis.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
